sentences.en: America’s wealth is underpinned by a global system which exploits the world’s poor.
sentences.cn: 美国的财富是靠一个剥削全世界穷人的全球体系来支撑的。

sentences.en: But private buying is unpredictable and cannot underpin the market in the way dealer - buying used to.
sentences.cn: 然而,个人收买的数量难以预料,并不能像经销商交易那样使市场稳定.

sentences.en: If the trend in rising employment continues, it could help underpin consumption levels.
sentences.cn: 如果就业率的上升趋势得以持续, 将有助于支撑消费水平.

sentences.en: Producers have, therefore, preferred term sales contracts to underpin upfront investment.
sentences.cn: 因此, 生产商青睐长期销售合约,以保证前期投资.

sentences.en: That reality must underpin our partnership.
sentences.cn: 这一现实必须支撑我们的合作伙伴关系.

sentences.en: That really must underpin our partnership.
sentences.cn: 我们的伙伴关系必须基于这一现实.

sentences.en: The present invention also provides the construction process of the active foundation underpin structure.
sentences.cn: 本发明还提供了主动桩基托换结构的施工方法.

sentences.en: the theories that underpin his teaching method
sentences.cn: 支持他的教学方法的理论

sentences.en: There are, however, two secular trends that underpin the growth in the industry.
sentences.cn: 然而, 有两项长期因素支撑着这行业的增长.

words.tran_cn: 巩固；支持；从下面支撑；加强…的基础

trans.tran_cn: 巩固；支持；从下面支撑；加强…的基础
trans.tran_en: to give strength or support to something and to help it succeed

trans.tran_cn: 用砖石结构等从下面支撑（墙等），加固（墙等）的基础，加强…的基础
trans.tran_en: to give strength or support to something and to help it succeed
